Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package skopeo for versions less than 1.14.4-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package skopeo for versions less than 1.14.4-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package skopeo is earlier than 1.14.4-3, affected by CVE-2023-45288
